entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Drayton Valley

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 27 March 2023
